arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.
arguments.name: name

arguments.name: x1

arguments.description: The y coordinate of the start point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.description: The x coordinate of the first control point of the quadratic curve segment.

description: Draws a curved line. The curve is controlled by a single point.
name: imagedrawquadraticcurve
